featured.text: A culture’s folk tales, fables, songs, and proverbs are an important part of its literature.

definition.zh_def: 諺語：具有智慧或道德教訓的簡短語句，通常是口耳相傳的。
definition.en_def: A proverb is a short, well-known saying that expresses a general truth or piece of advice.
definition.example: Actions speak louder than words is a common proverb.
